flavorText:
"The Demonlord has ruled every age. Every ruin, myth, and nightmare proves his power."
—"Rite of Belzenlok"

foreignData.flavorText: „Der Dämonenfürst hat über jedes Zeitalter geherrscht. Jede Ruine, jeder Mythos und jeder Nachtmahr sind Zeugnis seiner Macht." —„Ritus des Belzenlok"
foreignData.name: Kabbalisten-Paladin
foreignData.text: Immer wenn du einen historischen Zauberspruch wirkst, fügt der Kabbalisten-Paladin jedem Gegner 2 Schadenspunkte zu. (Legenden, Artefakte und Sagen sind historisch.)

foreignData.flavorText: "El señor demonio ha reinado en todas las eras. Todas las ruinas, mitos y pesadillas son una muestra de su poder". —"Rito de Belzenlok"
foreignData.name: Paladín de la Cábala
foreignData.text: Siempre que lances un hechizo histórico, el Paladín de la Cábala hace 2 puntos de daño a cada oponente. (Los artefactos, las Sagas y las cartas legendarias son cartas históricas.)

foreignData.flavorText: « Le Seigneur démon a régné sur chaque âge. Chaque ruine, chaque mythe, chaque cauchemar est une preuve de son pouvoir. » —« Rituel de Belzenlok »
foreignData.name: Paladin de la Coterie
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort historique, le Paladin de la Coterie inflige 2 blessures à chaque adversaire. (Les artefacts, les légendaires et les sagas sont historiques.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Il Signore dei Demoni ha dominato tutte le ere. Ogni rovina, mito e incubo è prova del suo potere." —"Rito di Belzenlok"
foreignData.name: Paladino della Cabala
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia storica, il Paladino della Cabala infligge 2 danni a ogni avversario. (Artefatti, carte leggendarie e Saghe sono carte storiche.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「悪魔王は永代の支配者。廃墟や神話や悪夢、その一切が悪魔王の御力の証なり。」 ――「ベルゼンロック典礼」
foreignData.name: 陰謀団の聖騎士
foreignData.text: あなたが歴史的な呪文を唱えるたび、陰謀団の聖騎士は各対戦相手にそれぞれ２点のダメージを与える。（歴史的とは、アーティファクトと伝説と英雄譚のことである。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・騎士

foreignData.flavorText: "악마군주는 모든 시대의 지배자이니. 모든 폐허와 신화, 그리고 악몽이 그의 힘을 증명한다." —"벨젠로크의 의식"
foreignData.name: 도당의 성기사
foreignData.text: 당신이 역사적 주문을 발동할 때마다, 도당의 성기사는 각 상대에게 피해 2점을 입힌다. (마법물체와 전설적, 서사시가 역사적이다.)

foreignData.flavorText: "O Senhor Demônio governou cada uma das eras. Cada ruína, mito e pesadelo é prova de seu poder." — "Rito de Belzenlok"
foreignData.name: Paladino da Cabala
foreignData.text: Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica histórica, Paladino da Cabala causa 2 pontos de dano a cada oponente. (Os artefatos, os cards lendários e as Sagas são cards históricos.)

foreignData.flavorText: «Демон-Владыка правил во все века. В руинах, мифах, кошмарах — всюду свидетельства его могущества». — «Обряд Бельзенлока»
foreignData.name: Паладин Кабала
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете историческое заклинание, Паладин Кабала наносит 2 повреждения каждому оппоненту. (Артефакты, легендарные карты и Саги являются историческими.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「恶魔领主统治千秋万代。处处遗迹、篇篇传说、场场梦魇尽证声威。」 ～「贝赞洛仪式」
foreignData.name: 柯帮神圣武士
foreignData.text: 每当你施放史迹咒语时，柯帮神圣武士向每位对手各造成2点伤害。（神器、传奇和传纪是史迹。）

foreignData.flavorText: 「惡魔領主統治千秋萬代。處處遺跡、篇篇傳說、場場夢魘盡證聲威。」 ～「貝贊洛儀式」
foreignData.name: 柯幫神聖武士
foreignData.text: 每當你施放史跡咒語時，柯幫神聖武士向每位對手各造成2點傷害。（神器、傳奇和傳紀是史跡。）

name: Cabal Paladin
originalText: Whenever you cast a historic spell, Cabal Paladin deals 2 damage to each opponent. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

rulings.text: A card, spell, or permanent is historic if it has the legendary supertype, the artifact card type, or the Saga subtype. Having two of those qualities doesn’t make an object more historic than another or provide an additional bonus—an object either is historic or it isn’t.
Some abilities trigger “whenever you cast a historic spell.” Such an ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
An ability that triggers “whenever you cast a historic spell” doesn’t trigger if a historic card is put onto the battlefield without being cast.

Lands are never cast, so abilities that trigger “whenever you cast a historic spell” won’t trigger if you play a legendary land. They also won’t trigger if a card on the battlefield transforms into a legendary land, as the Ixalan and Rivals of Ixalan double-faced cards do.

text: Whenever you cast a historic spell, Cabal Paladin deals 2 damage to each opponent. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
